possible_choices: AEs try to minimize the reconstruction error while VAEs do not.
VAEs assume noise in the input space, while AEs do not.
VAEs assume a standard Gaussian latent distribution while AEs do not.
AEs are linear while VAEs are not.
choice_explanations: Not quite. VAEs do that, too - they just have other parts of the loss, as well.
Not quite. Many AEs do that, too.
No, AEs can be nonlinear, as well.
